creator: kubo@jiubao.org
text:
Created attachment 30949
fix apr_match_glob("/*", ... )

The root directory contains several directories and files.
But apr_match_glob("/*", ... ) doens't work. It returns APR_ENOENT.
That's because apr_pstrndup(p, pattern, idx - pattern) returns an empty string ("") and apr tris to open "".
